entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 4.

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
